properties.title: building-footprints
properties.description: Parquet dataset with overture building footprints for this region.

table:columns.name: id
table:columns.description: A unique identifier for each building or structure.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Geospatial geometry data defining the shape and position of the building or structure.

table:columns.name: version
table:columns.description: Version number of the building or structure data.

table:columns.name: updateTime
table:columns.description: Timestamp indicating the last update of the data.

table:columns.name: sources
table:columns.type: list<item: struct<confidence: null, dataset: string, property: string, recordid: string>>
table:columns.description: List of sources from which the building or structure data was derived, including the properties used, the dataset name, the record ID, and a confidence score.

table:columns.name: class
table:columns.description: Classification of the building or structure, indicating its primary use or function.

table:columns.name: hasParts
table:columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the building or structure is composed of multiple parts.

table:columns.name: height
table:columns.description: Height of the building or structure in meters.

table:columns.name: numFloors
table:columns.description: Number of floors in the building or structure.

table:columns.name: facadeColor
table:columns.description: Primary color of the building's facade.

table:columns.name: facadeMaterial
table:columns.description: Primary material of the building's facade.

table:columns.name: roofMaterial
table:columns.description: Material used for the roof of the building or structure.

table:columns.name: roofShape
table:columns.description: Shape or design of the roof.

table:columns.name: roofDirection
table:columns.description: Direction the roof faces, measured in degrees from north.

table:columns.name: roofOrientation
table:columns.description: Orientation of the roof, typically described as flat, pitched, etc.

table:columns.name: roofColor
table:columns.description: Primary color of the roof.

table:columns.name: eaveHeight
table:columns.description: Height of the eaves from the ground, in meters.

table:columns.name: level
table:columns.description: Specifies the floor level for multi-story buildings or structures.

table:columns.name: theme
table:columns.description: The thematic category of the building or structure.

table:columns.name: type
table:columns.description: A more specific type within the general class or theme of the building or structure.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey corresponding to the building or structure location at a specified zoom level, following the Bing Maps Tile System.

table:columns.name: quadkey_prefix
table:columns.description: The prefix of the QuadKey, typically representing a higher level of spatial aggregation.

data.title: building-footprints
data.description: Parquet dataset with overture building footprints for this region.
